text: Dutton is a ghost town in Elko County, in the U.S. state of Nevada. ==History== A post office was established at Dutton in 1907, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1913. Growth of nearby Midas, Nevada spelled the end of Dutton. ==References== Category:Ghost towns in Nevada Category:Ghost towns in Elko County, Nevada
title: Dutton, Nevada
